article:
A man's daughter was not satisfied with her present life and she constantly complained to her father about how hard her life was. She was   _   and wanted to give up.
Her father filled three pots with   _   and spread them on the fire. The daughter looked at him in a strange way,   _   what he was trying to do . He then put carrots, eggs and coffee beans in each pot respectively without saying a word . Half an hour later, he   turned off   the fire. He picked the carrots  and eggs   _   and put them in two bowls  . Then he poured  the coffee in another bowl .
He asked his daughter to touch the   _  . She did and 42 _  in a low voice that they were soft . He then asked her to take an egg and   _   it . After pulling off the shell , she observed the hard-boiled egg. Finally, he asked her to   _   the coffee . She frowned  at the coffee and couldn't stand its strange smell.
  _   , she asked , " What does it mean, Father ?"
He explained, "Each of them   _   the same 100 degrees of boiling water.   _  , each reacted  differently ."
"After going through the boiling water, the carrots became   _  . An egg is easy to   _  . But now its inside has become hardened . The coffee beans were   _  . After they were in the boiling water, they became stronger and richer."
Which food are you?   _   adversity knocks on your door, you should act like the coffee bean. The bean can not be in its wonderful   _   until it reaches 100 degrees. When the water gets the   _  , it just tastes better. When things are at their worst and   _   are at their greatest, you should make more effort . Then you will win success.   On the contrary  , you will become a loser with no strength like carrots or hardened like eggs with a stiff heart. Even in a food story lies in a big lesson for us to learn from in our life, so please keep fighting like the coffee beans.
